Enjoyable game, but the DC penalty is way too high especially with the toxicity in the community. The penalty should never go above 1 hour regardless of how many times someone DCs. Maybe instead of giving the person an extremely long penalty, lower the amount of gens needed to be done if someone leaves within the first 2 minutes. I'm just tired of toxic survivors and killers then being punished. The report system hasn't seemed to do much at least for me personally. BUT IT IS ABSOLUTELY A GREAT GAME.

Basicamente o jogo é muito bom, bem divertido com uma jogabilidade muito boa. Fora que estão sempre trazendo conteúdo novo para o game e isso é ótimo. A parte ruim é o servidor, como não tem servidor no Brasil, as vezes é hard jogar, e vc tem que possuir um pc razoável pra jogar, no meu note mesmo, a jogabilidade foi prejudicada, acho necessário um ssd talvez.

One day, a wise man introduce me into this game.

"it shall protect your virginity, my lad" he said.

Not many people speak your language.
Not many people play well.
Not many people talk nicely.
Not many people work as a team.

But if you find people that do...
You'll have the most fun you've ever had.

It's like an unhealthy one-way relationship.
Like, you have invested so much time and energy to making things work,
but somehow you're never good enough and it is always your fault.
You still love them though..
это классная игра. можно играть за маньяка или выжившего. адреналина хоть отбавляй!
fun game just dont get fustrated as there is a huge skill difference and you have to put some hours in to understand each killer ect but your have fun doing it :)

Incredible game. A collection of some of the biggest names in horror and pop culture icons with a number of original characters to bolster. An endless number of combinations of builds and items, mostly limited by your own imagination (and how much you want to win - the meta is stale). The game is very grindy and realistically speaking, it costs a lot of money to access all of the content it has to offer. This is not a game where just playing enough will allow you to unlock even a portion of the characters (and even if you could, licensed characters are locked behind a paywall). Events/battle passes are mediocre and often recycled content. Game is incredibly buggy, things break or don't work as expected often, servers are not great and dev response is often sluggish and misguided. Game is also incredibly unbalanced, but it clearly isn't intended to be. Overall, a fun game with a good vision, an almost infinite amount of content to be experienced, fun and unique characters and frequent updates to add more to the game.

新手屠夫去美服可以有很好的游戏体验，不过延迟有点高，里面的老外都当恐怖娱乐游戏来玩很少有竞技性，四跑了也没有人嘲讽你，反而会鼓励你，让你下次加油，看到最多的话就是ggwellpalyed，不过，既然来美服玩，就入乡随俗，别把中韩那一套自卑扭曲的赢癌带过去，不要破坏美服的环境。相反我在《韩服》根本没有游戏体验怨气太大了，但真能练出技术来，棒子跟一些低素质的国人恨不得就是搞崩你的心态,不管你玩的怎么样赛后小剧场肯定会嘲讽你EZ，NOOB，车队的国人素质跟棒子唯一的区别就是国人会打拼音你看的懂，棒子说的话你看不懂，这是玩过游戏当中唯一一个承认国人玩家素质低的游戏。

This game is super thrilling and it really gives you "The Chills" when you play as a survivor but when your playing as the killer you have this fun sensation of hunting people down and injuring them just to hang them on a giant hook... WAIT that sounds psychotic well anyway this game has lots of varieties of survivors, killers,perks and tools to choose from just to fit your play style. The gore of the game isn't so bad the trailers might look a bit to much for any child under 13 but the ingame gore isn't that bad there might be some people who leave you behind or killers who play unfairly, luckily there is a solution for that. There is a report button after you finish the match. Leaving matches while they are ongoing might result in penalty so play fair don't rage quite and just have fun its worth it trust me.

Игра сама по себе not bad, но она выглядит словно игра с 2000 года где нету абсолютно никаких изменений настроек кроме сенсы и громкости. За маньяка FOV 60, а то и меньше, нельзя по человечески изменить графику. К примеру я хочу только текстуры высокого качества, а эфекты и прочее на минимум, но нет в этой говно игре только один пункт с настройкой графики
